Package index

All functions

openalex_api()
Endpoint used for requests to OpenAlex API
openalex_attribution()
Attribution
openalex_counts()
Counts from OpenAlex
openalex_crawl()
Crawl multiple pages of results
openalex_doi_lookup()
Lookup DOIs using OpenAlex
openalex_flatten_long()
Flatten R object from deserialized nested JSON object
openalex_key()
Use an API key for OpenAlex Premium Subscription
openalex_kth_rawaff_query()
Example query when searching raw affiliation strings
openalex_polite()
Enter the OpenAlex API polite pool for faster requests by providing an email
openalex_topics()
Topics
openalex_work()
Retrieve work from OpenAlex REST API
openalex_works_created_since()
Recently created works based on query for matching raw affiliations
openalex_works_cursorcrawl()
Crawl multipage responses from queries against the API
openalex_works_export()
Use OpenAlex API for exporting data in tabular and wos formats
openalex_works_published_since()
Recently published works based on query for matching raw affiliations
openalex_works_updated_since()
Recently updated works based on query for matching raw affiliations
openalex_write_duckdb()
Export the results from a crawl as a duckdb database file
topics
Topics
wos_plaintext_for_diva()
Function which converts a wos_plaintext-string into a format which can be uploaded to DiVA, by adding ER tags (including a blank line) after each record

Developed by Markus Skyttner.
